import ReactPlayer from'react-player';import{useRef}from'react';import videoFile from'./resources/vid.mp4';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Video=()=>{const playerRef=useRef(null);// Функция для воспроизведения видео
